LightningComponentBundle.description: Component to create new Lead records. Can be used in Lightning pages, Communities, and Experience Cloud.

property.name: showTitle
property.label: Show Title
property.description: Show or hide the card title

property.name: cardIconName
property.label: Card Icon
property.description: Icon to display in the card header

property.name: redirectAfterCreate
property.label: Redirect After Create
property.description: Redirect to the Lead record page after creation

property.name: resetFormAfterCreate
property.label: Reset Form After Create
property.description: Reset the form after successful creation

property.name: leadIdToUpdate
property.label: Lead Id To Update
property.description: If provided, loads the Lead and updates it instead of creating a new one
